newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Australian bonds underperform US once again.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Australian bonds underperform US once again.

text.p: Australian bonds produced another weak performance compared with its dollar bloc partners and yield spreads continued this week's widening trend.
Uncertainty over the interest rate outlook after this week's generally firm data combined with a mildly hawkish speech by the RBA governor Ian Macfarlane on Thursday to pull local yields higher.

The spread widening was compounded by a firm tone in U.S. Treasuries, which resumed trading in Tokyo after Thursday's U.S. Thanksgiving Day holiday, although there was support for local bonds once the 10-year spread widened to 110 basis points.
This margin had eased briefly to below 90 basis points at the start of the week.
